      • connect

        public boolean connect(boolean override,
                       ICancellable cancel)
        Establishes the connection.
        Parameters:
        override, - if true the previous downloaded data will be overridden
        Returns:
        true if the connection was successful, or false if it was no possible to establish the connection for any reason such as version negotiation.

      • getOnlineResources

        public Hashtable getOnlineResources()
        Returns a Hash table containing the values for each online resource. Using as key a String with name of the WMS request and the value returned by the hash is another string containing the corresponding Url
        Returns:
        HashTable
